page.title: 02RELIGION ST.HUGH'S MONASTERY
page.content: {ST HUGH'S MONASTERY}is a Carthusian Monastery.The Main House is La Grande Chartreuse in France.It was built in 1877 in The French Gothic Style.The architect was M.Norman of Calais.There are 20 monks.They come from all over Europe.There are 8 English,2 Scots, 3 Irish,1Spaniard,1 Dutch,2 Poles, 1Swiss and 1 Hungarian.The monks live in a"cell" consisting of 4 rooms and a small garden.Their diet consists of eggs,fish,bread,margarine,cheese, vegetables and fruit.Meat is never taken.The monk leaves his cell three times a day for Mass ,Vespers and the long Night Office from 12 midnight till 2 a.m.Their habits are made of heavy white wool.They keep chickens and bees and grow vegetables and fruit.They buy in clothing and bookbinding materials and seeds and plants for the kitchen garden.
